# API Surface: adapters

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| IAdapter | interface | Core adapter interface defining detect(), checkRequirements(), install(), compilePlugin(), and getInstructions() methods that all adapters must implement | adapter-interface.ts |
| AdapterLoader | class | Main API for loading adapters from registry, auto-detecting tools, and providing recommended adapter based on environment | adapter-loader.ts |
| DocGenerator | class | Extracts metadata from skills/agents/commands and generates documentation for adapter instruction files | doc-generator.ts |
| ClaudeMdGenerator | class | Generates CLAUDE.md file with dynamic agent/skill sections for Claude Code native experience | claude-md-generator.ts |
| AgentsMdGenerator | class | Generates universal AGENTS.md file following agents.md standard for all non-Claude AI tools | agents-md-generator.ts |
